name: Sneaky Toast
description:
You are a toast who has one mission: Serve yourself to the customer.

Sneak yourself away from the germs, obtain toppings to improve your quality, and walk up to the customer as a delicious toast, making their day better~

Controls:

WASD to move

Space to jump

Shift to hide or unhide yourself

Backspace to zoom out

Credits:

  • UI Graphics made by https://bitterjoyrok.itch.io/ (Hyper Casual Gritty UI)
  • Music, Sound Effect, Sprites, and Animation made by me
  • Game background made by Rion (https://instagram.com/rionbrodie)
